page.title: 19Sailing
page.content: The most popular water sport in Unst is sailing. The Unst Boating and Swimming Club was founded in 1891.The new clubhouse was opened in 1984 and has changing and storage facilities, a kitchen and a social area. There are 55 members,of whom 10 are women. Out of eleven skippers, there is only one lady. Most of the boats are Shetland model class with a crew of 3 and others are dinghies with a crew of 2 sailors. They all use Bermudan rigs. The sailing season lasts for about 18 weeks. There races on Sunday evenings and an all-day Regatta. Most crews also take part in Regattas at Uyeasound and at the Inter-Club Regatta in Lerwick,which is the final event of the Shetland Season.
